subtitle: A satisfying vegetarian dish.

method.text: Place the chickpeas in a large bowl. Cover with boiling water. Cover the bowl and heat for 5 min on 100% FULL power. Allow to stand for 1 hour. Drain thoroughly.

Return the chickpeas to the bowl. Cover with fresh boiling water and cover the dish. Cook on 100% full power for 10 min. Then cook for 40 min on 30% MEDIUM low power or until tender. Drain thoroughly.
Heat the oil in a casserole dish for 2 min on 100% FULL power. Add the onion and garlic. Mix well. Cover and cook on 100% FULL power for 3 min.
Stir in the spices and sweet potato. Cover and cook on 100% FULL power for 5-6 min, stirring once halfway through. Season well.
Add the chickpeas. Stir well. Cover and cook on 100% FULL power for 4-5 min, stirring once, until piping hot.
Stir in the yogurt or soured cream and heat, uncovered on 30% MEDIUM low power for 1-2 min. Serve immediately.

title: Spiced chickpeas and sweet potato - microwave
